last_episode_to_air.name: Lost Leader
last_episode_to_air.overview: When one of T.J.s plans goes wrong and Gus breaks his leg he won't make another plan.  It's up to the others to get T.J. back to his old self

name: Recess
overview: Six brave fourth-graders at Third Street School make it their mission to protect the other kids on the playground. Despite the rule of King Bob and his minions, who enforce his unwritten laws, T.J, Ashley, Vince, Gus, Gretchen and Mikey seek a rational balance between conformity and individuality.

episodes.name: The Break In
episodes.overview: The main kids try to get all the other kids to help rescue T.J. when Miss Finster punishes him by making him have no recess.

episodes.name: The New Kid
episodes.overview: New kid Gus arrives at Third Street Elementary, but has to endure the indignities that a new kid must undergo.

episodes.name: Parents' Night
episodes.overview: Spinelli will do anything to keep her parents from attending parents' night and meeting the others.

episodes.name: Swing on Thru to the Other Side
episodes.overview: Spinelli is inspired to form a cult based on the Swinger Girl then she thinks she's seen her swing over the top into another dimension.

episodes.name: First Name Ashley
episodes.overview: The Ashleys try to force Spinelli to be just like them when Spinelli's first name is revealed.

guest_stars.character: Ashley 'Ashley B' Boulet / Upside-Down Girl / Swinger Girl (voice)
guest_stars.name: Francesca Marie Smith

episodes.name: To Finster with Love
episodes.overview: The kids bring Miss Finster together with Hank when they find out she has a crush on him.

episodes.name: King Gus
episodes.overview: Bob installs Gus as a substitute king while he has a tonsilectomy, figuring Gus will be easy to control. But Gus turns into a despot instead.

episodes.name: Big Brother Chad
episodes.overview: The kids, and Vince himself, come to the awful realization that Vince's once popular older brother Chad has grown up into a geek.

episodes.name: My Fair Gretchen
episodes.overview: The kids come up with a plan to keep Gretchen from being transferred to Oppenheimer Elementary for the Incredibly Extremely Gifted.

episodes.name: Speedy, We Hardly Knew Ye
episodes.overview: The kids stage an elaborate funeral for the 4th grade class's beloved hamster, wherein they learn about how many lives the hamster has touched.

episodes.name: I Will Kick No More Forever
episodes.overview: Vince completely loses his confidence at playing kickball when Ashley Q. beats him in a game.

episodes.name: The Kid Came Back
episodes.overview: A weird little boy keeps tagging along behind the kids, apparently causing a streak of bad luck.

episodes.name: The Pest
episodes.overview: Jeffrey, an annoying jerk of a boy, insists that Gretchen will be his girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Legend of Big Kid
episodes.overview: What do the kindergarteners have planned for T.J. when they capture him?

episodes.name: The Box
episodes.overview: Miss Finster comes up with a new punishment that reduces T.J. to a vegetable.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview: Randall accuses Spinelli of hitting him with a rock during a dirt clod war so the kids put her on trial.

episodes.name: Teachers Lounge
episodes.overview: The kids dream about what the teachers' lounge must be like.

episodes.name: Randall's Reform
episodes.overview: Loneliness compels Randall to want to make friends with the other kids.

episodes.name: Rainy Days
episodes.overview: The kids grow increasingly frustrated when rain keeps then indoors for recess for days.

episodes.name: The Great Can Drive
episodes.overview: At first only Mikey wants to participate in the Thanksgiving can drive competition against the unbeatable Ashleys.  But then the other kids join in to beat the Ashleys.

episodes.name: The Great Jungle Gym Stand Off
episodes.overview: The kids stage a protest when Prickly plans to tear down Ol' Rusty to replace it with a new jungle gym.

episodes.name: Jinxed
episodes.overview: The Ashleys jinx Gus according to the playground rules so that he can't talk until his friends say his name.

episodes.name: The Experiment
episodes.overview: The kids carry out a crucial experiment to see if it's really true that their future will be boys kissing girls and girls kissing boys.

episodes.name: Officer Mikey
episodes.overview: The others try to help out when Mikey wants to be a safety ranger.

guest_stars.character: Ashley 'Ashley B' Boulet / Upside-Down Girl / Swinger Girl (voice)
guest_stars.name: Francesca Marie Smith

episodes.name: The Voice
episodes.overview: Principal Prickly needs Mikey to sing the National Anthem at the PTA Spring Fling, but Mikey only sings well in the bathroom.  So he brings in a music teacher to bring the Robert Goulet out of Mikey.

episodes.name: Kids in the Mist
episodes.overview: The kids deal with a pompous expert on child research who wants to study them as they play.

episodes.name: The Game
episodes.overview: Gus finds a tile from the game Ajimbo and soon the entire student body gets caught in its evil grasp.

episodes.name: The Lost Ball
episodes.overview: Gus has to go to the Yard of No Return when he kicks a good kickball over the fence.

episodes.name: Gus' Last Stand
episodes.overview: Gus winds up the new victim of bully Gelman's wrath.

episodes.name: Operation Field Trip
episodes.overview: All the kids go on a big field trip to MISOOE (The Museum of Industry, Science, Oceanography, Oddities and Energy).  But Ol' Smokey, the bus with the main kids, breaks down in the middle of nowhere.

episodes.name: The Challenge
episodes.overview: A visit from Principal Prickly's brother Paul leads to a challenge between 3rd Street and 98th Street kickball teams.

episodes.name: Wild Child
episodes.overview: In the "Pee Wee Pals" program, the main kids each have to take care of a kindergartner during recess.

episodes.name: The Substitute
episodes.overview: Substitute teacher Mr. E. captivates all the kids with his command of authority, except T.J.

episodes.name: Gretchen and the Secret of Yo
episodes.overview: Gretchen turns to former yo-yo champ Tommy Tate to learn how to master the yo-yo.

episodes.name: The Girl Was Trouble
episodes.overview: Gretchen's search for her stolen laptop leads her on a journey among the school's delinquents that ultimately brings about her downfall.

episodes.name: Copycat Kid
episodes.overview: Mikey wants to be exactly like Vince when Vince saves his life.

episodes.name: Operation Stuart
episodes.overview: The kids take in a really ratty stray cat that they find near the dumpster, naming it Stuart.

episodes.name: Pharaoh Bob
episodes.overview: King Bob orders the kids to build him a pyramid so that all future classes will remember him.

episodes.name: The Hypnotist
episodes.overview: A hypnotist performing for the kids inadvertantly hypnotizes Principal Prickly into thinking he's six years old.

episodes.name: Mama's Girl
episodes.overview: Spinelli gets labelled a mama's girl when she inadvertantly calls Ms. Grotke ""Mama.""

episodes.name: Economics of Recess
episodes.overview: When the playground goes on the monsticker standard T.J. goes down the path from poverty to wealth.

episodes.name: Omega Kids
episodes.overview: The main kids wish they could have the overcrowded school to themselves, then surprisingly get their wish.

episodes.name: Yes, Mikey, Santa Does Shave
episodes.overview: Mikey is the only fourth grader who still believes in Santa Claus.  He tries to convince the others Santa exists.

episodes.name: The Story of Whomps
episodes.overview: Principal Prickly and Miss Finster deem T.J.'s word "whomps" as a cuss and punish him for it, starting a scandal that leads all the way to the board of education.

episodes.name: Weekend at Muriel's
episodes.overview: Miss Finster agrees to babysit Spinelli for the weekend while her parents are away.

episodes.name: Bad Hair Day
episodes.overview: T.J. and Vince manage to convince everyone that the bad haircut they gave Mikey is actually cool.

episodes.name: Dance Lessons
episodes.overview: Spinelli's parents put her in Mlle. Povlova's dance school, where she teams up with Mikey.

episodes.name: Principal for a Day
episodes.overview: Principal Prickly and Miss Finster plot to turn T.J. over to their own side by making him principal for a day.

episodes.name: The Beauty Contest
episodes.overview: The Ashleys get back at Spinelli by entering her into the Kiddie Cosmetics Little Miss Blush Beauty Pageant. But her friends talk Spinelli into trying to beat the Ashleys in the pageant.

episodes.name: The Break-Up
episodes.overview: The gang breaks up when they are forced to choose a best friend to write about.

episodes.name: Outcast Ashley
episodes.overview: Ashley A. hooks up with Gretchen when she sins against the clique so gravely as to get thrown out.

episodes.name: One Stayed Clean
episodes.overview: On class picture day, the kids vow to keep Gus clean as he's never had a class picture of him taken.

episodes.name: A Genius Among Us
episodes.overview: Someone else besides Gretchen is a math genius, and through math, Gretchen starts a close relationship with this person.

episodes.name: Dodgeball City
episodes.overview: The main kids discover that Gus was once a notorious dodgeball player who went by the name of El Diablo.

episodes.name: A Career to Remember
episodes.overview: A career day assembly gets all the kids to decide their future careers.  That is all except Spinelli.

episodes.name: Kindergarten Derby
episodes.overview: Every year the older kids pick kindergarteners to race in the Kindergarten Derby. This year an eager Tubby gets an unwilling Mikey to sponsor him in the race.

episodes.name: The Bet
episodes.overview: Fed up with Vince's ego, the kids bet Vince that he can't go one whole day without beating someone in a sport.

episodes.name: Space Cadet
episodes.overview: T.J. takes charge when Gretchen seems to achieve a dream that T.J.'s always had, to be an astronaut on the space shuttle.

episodes.name: Stand Up Randall
episodes.overview: Randall becomes popular when he uses a joke book to make himself a standup comedian.

episodes.name: The Shiner
episodes.overview: T.J. shows up in school with a black eye. Everyone makes up wild stories about the heroic acts T.J. must have done to get the shiner.

episodes.name: Lord of the Nerds
episodes.overview: T.J. breaks his clavicle and now has to spend recess with the ""pale kids"" in Room 51.

episodes.name: That Stinking Feeling
episodes.overview: Spinelli gets a crush on a fifth grader and has to get over it to save her reputation.

episodes.name: My Funny Valentines
episodes.overview: In his hatred of Valentine's Day, T.J. sends a ""funny"" valentine to every single girl on the playground to show them how stupid Valentine's Day is, but his plan soon backfires when the girls mistake them for ""real"" valentine cards.

episodes.name: The Barnaby Boys
episodes.overview: T.J. and Vince are so into the "Barnaby Boys" books that they dress up like the Barnaby Boys and try to solve the mystery of the suspicious substitute janitor, Earl Raymond.

episodes.name: Buried Treasure
episodes.overview: TJ receives an old history textbook with a treasure map that leads the gang, Randall, and the Ashleys out to get the treasure. But as they get closer, greed arises and the 4th graders fight for the treasure.

episodes.name: The Library Kid
episodes.overview: When the gang catches the mysterious ""Libray Kid"", they take her out to recess where she becomes obssessed with the playground.

episodes.name: The Ratings Game
episodes.overview: Everyone is segregrated once the Ashley's start giving ratings to everyone on the playground.

episodes.name: The First Picture Show
episodes.overview: Señor Fusion: the Movie finally opens and T.J. vows to be there at its first screening.

episodes.name: The Big Prank
episodes.overview: The kids rope T.J. into a challenge to play a prank on King Bob before the end of the school day.

episodes.name: Hustler's Apprentice
episodes.overview: Gus winds up working for the Hustler Kid to pay off a debt, and soon he himself becomes the biggest hustler in the playground.

episodes.name: The Spy Who Came In from the Playground
episodes.overview: The main kids make a friend of new kid James Stone and show him all their little schemes, but soon regret that.

episodes.name: Gus' Fortune
episodes.overview: The kids find a paper fortune teller on the ground that predicts doom for Gus.

episodes.name: Rumor Mill
episodes.overview: The kids want to find out who started a rumor that a boy knocked over Mikey's popcorn at the movies and Mikey then threw the boy into the girl's bathroom.

episodes.name: Recess is Cancelled
episodes.overview: Secretary of Schools Garrison chooses 3rd Street School as the place to test his program to bring test scores up by cancelling recess.

episodes.name: Tattletale Heart
episodes.overview: The kids warn Gus not to break the code by telling Miss Finster who started a food fight.

episodes.name: The Madness of King Bob
episodes.overview: King Bob abandons his throne in his obsessive pursuit of pulling a prank on T.J. in this sequel to The Big Prank

episodes.name: Call Me Guy
episodes.overview: Gus takes a new identity when he discovers that people think he's a different cool kid when he doesn't wear them. Too bad ""Guy"" can't see a thing.

episodes.name: Prickly is Leaving
episodes.overview: Prickly finally gets his appointment to Spiro T. Agnew Middle School. But the kids try to make him stay after they meet the new Principal Slicer.

episodes.name: Randall's Friends
episodes.overview: Randall gets the main kids to pretend that they're his friends when his father, Leonard, visits the school on Randall's birthday.

episodes.name: The Biggest Trouble Ever
episodes.overview: The gang gets busted when they accidentally break a statue of a famous hero.

episodes.name: The Rules
episodes.overview: The original 1935 edition of The Rules of the Playground is discovered in the library.

episodes.name: Gus and Misdemeanors
episodes.overview: The bad kids from The Girl was Trouble trick Gus into shoplifting candy from Kelso's.

episodes.name: A Science Fair to Remember
episodes.overview: Second grade prodigy Becky Benson befriends Gretchen to get help for her science fair project. But she has an ulterior motive.

episodes.name: Mikey's Pants
episodes.overview: The gang tries to cover up Mikey's ripped pants so Finster won't catch him.

episodes.name: Here Comes Mr. Perfect
episodes.overview: Jared, the new student, appears to be perfect, making the rest of the school very jealous.

episodes.name: Good Luck Charm
episodes.overview: Spinelli gets too attached to the lucky marble that Vince loans her.

episodes.name: Diggers Split Up
episodes.overview: Digger Dave quits digging and then bosses everyone around.

episodes.name: Schoolworld
episodes.overview: The school gets a new technology system installed called the SAL 3000 which controls everything.

episodes.name: Bachelor Gus
episodes.overview: Thinking his family is moving away again, Gus moves under the jungle gym to avoid leaving his friends and school

episodes.name: The Dude
episodes.overview: T.J. and the gang meet Mr. Dudicoff, a student teacher who was a legend at 3rd Street School back in the day.

episodes.name: Partners in Crime
episodes.overview: Menlo and Randall team up to manipulate the entire playground.

episodes.name: The Candidates
episodes.overview: Gretchen and Vince both run for president.

episodes.name: This Brain for Hire
episodes.overview: People start paying Gretchen for doing their homework so she can buy herself a new bike

episodes.name: Spinelli's Masterpiece
episodes.overview: Spinelli channels her anger into a playground chalk drawing.

episodes.name: Nobody Doesn't Like T.J.
episodes.overview: T.J. can't figure out why Gordy doesn't like him.

episodes.name: Yope from Norway
episodes.overview: When a new kid from Norway comes to 3rd Street School, Gus befriends the kid by making him think that Gus is the hottest kid in the school.

episodes.name: Bonky Fever
episodes.overview: Scared of turning 10 on his soon-to-be bithday, Mikey develops an obssession of becoming a little kid again so he won't have to grow up.

episodes.name: Don't Ask Me
episodes.overview: Spinelli becomes popular as an advice giver when she sits in for Guru Kid.

episodes.name: The Secret Life of Grotke
episodes.overview: Ms. Grotke's strange behavior makes the kids think that she's a spy.

episodes.name: The Fuss over Finster
episodes.overview: Miss Finster hurts her leg and can't keep up with the kids during recess.

episodes.name: Soccer Boy
episodes.overview: Mikey makes the other kids regret not letting them play on their team for the playground's soccer tourney.

episodes.name: Fort Tender
episodes.overview: The bored main kids build their own fort. But then Lawson takes it over.

episodes.name: Germ Warfare
episodes.overview: Gus starts an obsessive crusade to kill all the germs in the world, while Mikey will do anything to save them.

episodes.name: More Like Gretchen
episodes.overview: Spinelli gets peeved with her parents heap so much praise for Gretchen at her expense.

episodes.name: Prince Randall
episodes.overview: Randall uses an embarrassing photo to blackmail King Bob into making him Playground Prince.

episodes.name: Me No Know
episodes.overview: Vince feels like an outsider after he misses the must-see movie of the weekend.

episodes.name: Good Ole T.J.
episodes.overview: Gretchen is worried when she's partnered with T.J. on a class project.

episodes.name: Chez Vince
episodes.overview: Disgusted by the horrible cafeteria food, Vince becomes the new school cook when the other kids try his cooking.

episodes.name: Tucked In Mikey
episodes.overview: Needing to prepare himself for a poet laureate ceremony, Mikey decides to listen to Menlo to learn how to organize himself.

episodes.name: Old Folks Home
episodes.overview: Mikey badgers the gang into a trip to senior citizens home.

episodes.name: Some Friend
episodes.overview: T.J. has a mysterious new friend.

episodes.name: The Coolest Heatwave Ever
episodes.overview: During a burning hot day, the gang attempts to make it across the playground to the otherside where there is a water pump.

episodes.name: No Strings Attached
episodes.overview: The gang is suspicious when the Ashleys give Spinelli six wrestling tickets.

episodes.name: Beyond a Reasonable Scout
episodes.overview: Mikey and Gus want to join the Woodchuck Scouts.

episodes.name: The C Note
episodes.overview: T.J. finds a $100 bill and along with the gang try to find out who lost it.

episodes.name: The Army Navy Game
episodes.overview: Gus and Theresa (Cornchip Girl) have a hard time becoming friends due to their rivaling fathers.

episodes.name: Big Ol' Mikey
episodes.overview: After Mikey helps Cornchip Girl off the climbing frame after she gets stuck, the gang wonder how big he will be. Gretchen and Galileo conduct a test to find out how big everyone will be when they are older, and Mikey's test says he will be 50 feet tall! The others find this cool and wonder what 50 foot Mikey could do, but Mikey isn't so sure that being 50 feet tall will be that great.

episodes.name: A Great State Fair
episodes.overview: Gus must stay behind from the fair because he forgot his permission slip, while the rest of the gang try to figure out a way to get Gus to the fair.

episodes.name: The A.V. Kid
episodes.overview: Vince and T.J. compete for the job as A.V. Kid, but their competition leads to a broken-up friendship between them.

episodes.name: The Principals of Golf
episodes.overview: The kids think Vince is getting special treatment when he becomes Prickly's golf partner.

episodes.name: All the Principal's Men
episodes.overview: The gang tries to find out who removed all the balls from the playground.

episodes.name: Lawson and His Crew
episodes.overview: Tired of TJ and his friends getting all the glory from King Bob, Lawson decides to get a gang of his own together. He recruits Randall, Menlow, Swinger Girl, Skeenes and Kurst the Worst and together the six start solving the playground's problems and getting the glory. Of course TJ and his friends now have nothing to do, so they are left just talking and eventually realise that just being friends is much better than getting all the glory they used to have. Friends being something that Lawson and his crew are definitely not ...

episodes.name: Terrifying Tales of Recess
episodes.overview: In this Hallowe'en episode, Butch tells us three terrifying tales of Recess. Children of the Cornchip: Cornchip Girl eats some untested cornchips and turns into a werekid! The gang have to save her.  When Bikes Attack!: The bikes that the kids ride to school everyday become alive and turn against their riders.  Night of the Living Finsters: Lawson challenges Vince to spend the night in the graveyard, only for the gang to discover that the school is built on the Finster family graveyard.

episodes.name: Kurst the Not So Bad
episodes.overview: Mikey's new friendship with Kurst the Worst doesn't sit well with their friends.

episodes.name: League of Randalls
episodes.overview: Randal recruits the Tylers, the Ashleys' little brothers, to help him snitch.

episodes.name: Mundy, Mundy
episodes.overview: Bad-guy Mundy becomes very poular after he prevents a ball from hitting a little kid.

episodes.name: Lost Leader
episodes.overview: When one of T.J.s plans goes wrong and Gus breaks his leg he won't make another plan.  It's up to the others to get T.J. back to his old self
